level.heading: State of mind proof requirement.
level.text: In a prosecution under §§ 22-3008 to 22-3010, prosecuted alone or in conjunction with charges under § 22-3018 or § 22-403, the government need not prove that the defendant knew the child's age or the age difference between himself or herself and the child.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 10-257
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-257, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 22-3001.
